verses.verse: וַיַּ֣רְא <WH7200> saw הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> And when the people כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for בֹשֵׁ֥שׁ <WH954> delayed מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> that Moses לָרֶ֣דֶת <WH3381> to come down מִן־ <WH4480> from הָהָ֑ר <WH2022> out of the mount וַיִּקָּהֵ֨ל <WH6950> gathered themselves together הָעָ֜ם <WH5971> the people עַֽל־ <WH5921> about אַהֲרֹ֗ן <WH175> unto Aaron וַיֹּאמְר֤וּ <WH559> and said אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> to him ק֣וּם ׀ <WH6965> unto him Up עֲשֵׂה־ <WH6213> make לָ֣נוּ אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> us gods אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who יֵֽלְכוּ֙ <WH1980> will go לְפָנֵ֔ינוּ <WH6440> before כִּי־ <WH3588> for זֶ֣ה ׀ <WH2088> this מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> us for [as for] this Moses הָאִ֗ישׁ <WH376> the man אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who הֶֽעֱלָ֙נוּ֙ <WH5927> that brought מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> us up out of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יָדַ֖עְנוּ <WH3045> we wot מֶה־ <WH4100> what הָ֥יָה <WH1961> has become לֽוֹ׃

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אֲלֵהֶם֙ <WH413> about אַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> And Aaron פָּֽרְקוּ֙ <WH6561> unto them Break off נִזְמֵ֣י <WH5141> earrings הַזָּהָ֔ב <WH2091> the golden אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which בְּאָזְנֵ֣י <WH241> which [are] in the ears נְשֵׁיכֶ֔ם <WH802> of your wives בְּנֵיכֶ֖ם <WH1121> of your sons וּבְנֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH1323> and of your daughters וְהָבִ֖יאוּ <WH935> and bring אֵלָֽי׃ <WH413> about

וַיִּתְפָּֽרְקוּ֙ <WH6561> brake off כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> And all the people אֶת־ <WH853> נִזְמֵ֥י <WH5141> earrings הַזָּהָ֖ב <WH2091> the golden אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בְּאָזְנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH241> which [were] in their ears וַיָּבִ֖יאוּ <WH935> and brought אֶֽל־ <WH413> to אַהֲרֹֽן׃ <WH175> [them] unto Aaron

וַיִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> And he received מִיָּדָ֗ם <WH3027> [them] at their hand וַיָּ֤צַר <WH3335> earthen אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> בַּחֶ֔רֶט <WH2747> it with a graving tool וַֽיַּעֲשֵׂ֖הוּ <WH6213> after he had made עֵ֣גֶל <WH5695> calf מַסֵּכָ֑ה <WH4541> it a molten וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> and they said אֵ֤לֶּה <WH428> This אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> These [be] thy gods יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> O Israel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who הֶעֱל֖וּךָ <WH5927> which brought מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> thee up out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

וַיַּ֣רְא <WH7200> saw אַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> And when Aaron וַיִּ֥בֶן <WH1129> [it] he built מִזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> an altar לְפָנָ֑יו <WH6440> before וַיִּקְרָ֤א <WH7121> made proclamation אַֽהֲרֹן֙ <WH175> it and Aaron וַיֹּאמַ֔ר <WH559> and said חַ֥ג <WH2282> [is] a feast לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> to the LORD מָחָֽר׃ <WH4279> To morrow

וַיַּשְׁכִּ֙ימוּ֙ <WH7925> And they rose up early מִֽמָּחֳרָ֔ת <WH4283> on the morrow וַיַּעֲל֣וּ <WH5927> and offered עֹלֹ֔ת <WH5930> burnt offerings וַיַּגִּ֖שׁוּ <WH5066> and brought שְׁלָמִ֑ים <WH8002> peace offerings וַיֵּ֤שֶׁב <WH3427> sat הָעָם֙ <WH5971> and the people לֶֽאֱכֹ֣ל <WH398> down to eat וְשָׁת֔וֹ <WH8354> and to drink וַיָּקֻ֖מוּ <WH6965> and rose up לְצַחֵֽק׃ <WH6711> to play פ

וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> said יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֶךְ־ <WH1980> Go רֵ֕ד <WH3381> get thee down כִּ֚י <WH3588> for שִׁחֵ֣ת <WH7843> have corrupted עַמְּךָ֔ <WH5971> for thy people אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom הֶעֱלֵ֖יתָ <WH5927> which thou broughtest מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

סָ֣רוּ <WH5493> They have turned מַהֵ֗ר <WH4118> aside quickly מִן־ <WH4480> from הַדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <WH1870> out of the way אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which צִוִּיתִ֔ם <WH6680> which I commanded עָשׂ֣וּ <WH6213> them they have made לָהֶ֔ם עֵ֖גֶל <WH5695> calf מַסֵּכָ֑ה <WH4541> them a molten וַיִּשְׁתַּֽחֲווּ־ <WH7812> and have worshipped לוֹ֙ וַיִּזְבְּחוּ־ <WH2076> it and have sacrificed ל֔וֹ וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> thereunto and said אֵ֤לֶּה <WH428> This אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> These [be] thy gods יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> O Israel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who הֶֽעֱל֖וּךָ <WH5927> which have brought thee up מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> unto Moses רָאִ֙יתִי֙ <WH7200> I have seen אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> this people הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> and behold עַם־ <WH5971> people קְשֵׁה־ <WH7186> churlish עֹ֖רֶף <WH6203> stiff-necked הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וְעַתָּה֙ <WH6258> Now הַנִּ֣יחָה <WH3240> Now therefore let me alone לִּ֔י וְיִֽחַר־ <WH2734> may wax hot אַפִּ֥י <WH639> that my wrath בָהֶ֖ם וַאֲכַלֵּ֑ם <WH3615> against them and that I may consume וְאֶֽעֱשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> them and I will make אוֹתְךָ֖ <WH853> לְג֥וֹי <WH1471> nation גָּדֽוֹל׃ <WH1419> of thee a great

וַיְחַ֣ל <WH2470> entreated מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶת־ <WH853> פְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> accept יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהָ֑יו <WH430> his God וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and said לָמָ֤ה <WH4100> why יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> LORD יֶחֱרֶ֤ה <WH2734> wax hot אַפְּךָ֙ <WH639> why doth thy wrath בְּעַמֶּ֔ךָ <WH5971> against thy people אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> whom הוֹצֵ֙אתָ֙ <WH3318> which thou hast brought forth מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> out of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt בְּכֹ֥חַ <WH3581> power גָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> with great וּבְיָ֥ד <WH3027> and with חֲזָקָֽה׃ <WH2389> and with a mighty

לָמָּה֩ <WH4100> Why יֹאמְר֨וּ <WH559> speak מִצְרַ֜יִם <WH4713> Egyptian לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> and say בְּרָעָ֤ה <WH7451> For mischief הֽוֹצִיאָם֙ <WH3318> did he bring לַהֲרֹ֤ג <WH2026> them out to slay אֹתָם֙ <WH853> בֶּֽהָרִ֔ים <WH2022> them in the mountains וּ֨לְכַלֹּתָ֔ם <WH3615> and to consume מֵעַ֖ל <WH5921> about פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> them from the face הָֽאֲדָמָ֑ה <WH127> land שׁ֚וּב <WH7725> break מֵחֲר֣וֹן <WH2740> from thy fierce אַפֶּ֔ךָ <WH639> wrath וְהִנָּחֵ֥ם <WH5162> and repent עַל־ <WH5921> about הָרָעָ֖ה <WH7451> of this evil לְעַמֶּֽךָ׃ <WH5971> against thy people

זְכֹ֡ר <WH2142> Remember לְאַבְרָהָם֩ <WH85> Abraham לְיִצְחָ֨ק <WH3327> Isaac וּלְיִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> and Israel עֲבָדֶ֗יךָ <WH5650> thy servants אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> to whom נִשְׁבַּ֣עְתָּ <WH7650> to whom thou swarest לָהֶם֮ בָּךְ֒ וַתְּדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> by thine own self and saidst אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> to אַרְבֶּה֙ <WH7235> unto them I will multiply אֶֽת־ <WH853> זַרְעֲכֶ֔ם <WH2233> your seed כְּכוֹכְבֵ֖י <WH3556> as the stars הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> of heaven וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הָאָ֨רֶץ <WH776> and all this land הַזֹּ֜את <WH2063> likewise אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> of which אָמַ֗רְתִּי <WH559> that I have spoken אֶתֵּן֙ <WH5414> of will I give לְזַרְעֲכֶ֔ם <WH2233> unto your seed וְנָחֲל֖וּ <WH5157> and they shall inherit לְעֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> [it] for ever

וַיִּנָּ֖חֶם <WH5162> repented יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> And the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> about הָ֣רָעָ֔ה <WH7451> of the evil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֖ר <WH1696> which he thought לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> to do לְעַמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5971> unto his people פ

וַיִּ֜פֶן <WH6437> turned וַיֵּ֤רֶד <WH3381> and went down מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> And Moses מִן־ <WH4480> from הָהָ֔ר <WH2022> from the mount וּשְׁנֵ֛י <WH8147> and the two לֻחֹ֥ת <WH3871> tables הָעֵדֻ֖ת <WH5715> of the testimony בְּיָד֑וֹ <WH3027> [were] in his hand לֻחֹ֗ת <WH3871> the tables כְּתֻבִים֙ <WH3789> [were] written מִשְּׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> on both עֶבְרֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5676> their sides מִזֶּ֥ה <WH2088> one וּמִזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> and the other הֵ֥ם <WH1992> they כְּתֻבִֽים׃ <WH3789> on the one side and on the other [were] they written

וְהַ֨לֻּחֹ֔ת <WH3871> And the tables מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <WH4639> [were] the work אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> of God הֵ֑מָּה <WH1992> like וְהַמִּכְתָּ֗ב <WH4385> and the writing מִכְתַּ֤ב <WH4385> [was] the writing אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> of God ה֔וּא <WH1931> he חָר֖וּת <WH2801> graven עַל־ <WH5921> on הַלֻּחֹֽת׃ <WH3871> upon the tables

וַיִּשְׁמַ֧ע <WH8085> heard יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <WH3091> And when Joshua אֶת־ <WH853> ק֥וֹל <WH6963> the noise הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> of the people בְּרֵעֹ֑ה <WH7452> as they shouted וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> he said אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> unto Moses ק֥וֹל <WH6963> [There is] a noise מִלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> of war בַּֽמַּחֲנֶה׃ <WH4264> in the camp

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֵ֥ין <WH369> Nor קוֹל֙ <WH6963> [It is] not the voice עֲנ֣וֹת <WH6030> of [them that] shout גְּבוּרָ֔ה <WH1369> for mastery וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> Nor ק֖וֹל <WH6963> neither [is it] the voice עֲנ֣וֹת <WH6030> of [them that] cry חֲלוּשָׁ֑ה <WH2476> for being overcome ק֣וֹל <WH6963> [but] the noise עַנּ֔וֹת <WH6030> testify אָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> I שֹׁמֵֽעַ׃ <WH8085> do I hear

וַֽיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> as קָרַב֙ <WH7126> And it came to pass as soon as he came nigh אֶל־ <WH413> about הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <WH4264> unto the camp וַיַּ֥רְא <WH7200> that he saw אֶת־ <WH853> הָעֵ֖גֶל <WH5695> the calf וּמְחֹלֹ֑ת <WH4246> and the dancing וַיִּֽחַר־ <WH2734> waxed hot אַ֣ף <WH639> anger מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> and Moses' וַיַּשְׁלֵ֤ךְ <WH7993> and he cast [מִיָּדֹו כ] (מִיָּדָיו֙ <WH3027> able ק) אֶת־ <WH853> הַלֻּחֹ֔ת <WH3871> the tables וַיְשַׁבֵּ֥ר <WH7665> and brake אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> them beneath הָהָֽר׃ <WH2022> the mount

וַיִּקַּ֞ח <WH3947> And he took אֶת־ <WH853> הָעֵ֨גֶל <WH5695> the calf אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which עָשׂוּ֙ <WH6213> which they had made וַיִּשְׂרֹ֣ף <WH8313> and burnt בָּאֵ֔שׁ <WH784> [it] in the fire וַיִּטְחַ֖ן <WH2912> and ground עַ֣ד <WH5704> against אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which דָּ֑ק <WH1854> [it] to powder וַיִּ֙זֶר֙ <WH2219> and strawed עַל־ <WH5921> over פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> [it] upon הַמַּ֔יִם <WH4325> the water וַיַּ֖שְׁקְ <WH8248> drink אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> and made the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> And Moses אֶֽל־ <WH413> to אַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> unto Aaron מֶֽה־ <WH4100> What עָשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> What did לְךָ֖ הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> this people הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that הֵבֵ֥אתָ <WH935> unto thee that thou hast brought עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> and חֲטָאָ֥ה <WH2401> a sin גְדֹלָֽה׃ <WH1419> so great

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said אַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> And Aaron אַל־ <WH408> nay יִ֥חַר <WH2734> wax hot אַ֖ף <WH639> Let not the anger אֲדֹנִ֑י <WH113> of my lord אַתָּה֙ <WH859> yourself יָדַ֣עְתָּ <WH3045> thou knowest אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> the people כִּ֥י <WH3588> are prone בְרָ֖ע <WH7451> that they [are set] on mischief הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> they

וַיֹּ֣אמְרוּ <WH559> For they said לִ֔י עֲשֵׂה־ <WH6213> unto me Make לָ֣נוּ אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> us gods אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who יֵלְכ֖וּ <WH1980> will go לְפָנֵ֑ינוּ <WH6440> before כִּי־ <WH3588> for זֶ֣ה ׀ <WH2088> this מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> us for [as for] this Moses הָאִ֗ישׁ <WH376> the man אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who הֶֽעֱלָ֙נוּ֙ <WH5927> that brought us up מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> out of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יָדַ֖עְנוּ <WH3045> we wot מֶה־ <WH4100> what הָ֥יָה <WH1961> has become לֽוֹ׃

וָאֹמַ֤ר <WH559> And I said לָהֶם֙ לְמִ֣י <WH4310> Whoever זָהָ֔ב <WH2091> unto them Whosoever hath any gold הִתְפָּרָ֖קוּ <WH6561> let them break וַיִּתְּנוּ־ <WH5414> [it] off So they gave לִ֑י וָאַשְׁלִכֵ֣הוּ <WH7993> [it] me then I cast בָאֵ֔שׁ <WH784> it into the fire וַיֵּצֵ֖א <WH3318> and there came out הָעֵ֥גֶל <WH5695> this calf הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

וַיַּ֤רְא <WH7200> saw מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> And when Moses אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> that the people כִּ֥י <WH3588> for פָרֻ֖עַ <WH6544> [were] naked ה֑וּא <WH1931> he כִּֽי־ <WH3588> them פְרָעֹ֣ה <WH6544> had made them naked אַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> (for Aaron לְשִׁמְצָ֖ה <WH8103> unto [their] shame בְּקָמֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH6965> among their enemies

וַיַּעֲמֹ֤ד <WH5975> stood מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> Then Moses בְּשַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> in the gate הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <WH4264> of the camp וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> and said מִ֥י <WH4310> Whoever לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Who [is] on the LORD'S אֵלָ֑י <WH413> about וַיֵּאָסְפ֥וּ <WH622> gathered אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> to כָּל־ <WH3605> all בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> side? [let him come] unto me And all the sons לֵוִֽי׃ <WH3878> of Levi
